concept.title: Sound Propagation
concept.shortdesc: Understanding how sound waves travel through different mediums.

section.title: Wave Motion
section.p: Sound propagates through elastic media as a longitudinal wave, where particles oscillate parallel to the direction of wave travel. The speed of sound varies depending on the medium's properties.

section.title: Propagation Speed
section.p: Sound travels at different speeds through different materials:

ul.li: Temperature: Higher temperatures increase propagation speed
Density: Affects the speed and efficiency of sound transmission
Humidity: Influences sound absorption in air
Wind: Can bend sound waves and affect perceived direction
